name: Trimorta
description:
Search for your missing crew and survive a seemingly desolate space fortress.

Gameplay
  • Explore the unknown to find and identify the lost members of your team.
  • Use the flashscan to inspect and defend yourself. Limited to only 6 charges, you'll need to recharge from light sources from time to time.
  • Find all 5 crewmates and head back to your space pod to escape and see how fast you finish with time-completion displayed at the ending.
Controls
  • WASD - MOVE
  • MOUSE - LOOK
  • HOLD LEFT MOUSE - FLASHSCAN [Inspect and Defense Tool]
  • HOLD RIGHT MOUSE - ABSORB LIGHT [Flashscan use]
  • SPACE - JUMP
  • HOLD LEFT SHIFT - RUN
  • HOLD LEFT CONTROL - CROUCH
Misc Info

Trimorta is a horror game made within 10 days for Scream Jam 2020.
Inspired by movies and games like Prometheus, Resident Evil and Destiny.

All 2D & 3D graphics assets were made from scratch. While the sound effects were edited from free -to-use sources, as well as the music.
